text:
TIRUNELVELI

St. John’s College: Ceremony to lay foundation stone for ‘Science Research Centre,’ Rt. Rev. J.J. Christdoss, Bishop of Tirunelveli CSI Diocese, presides, M. Karunakaran, Collector, and S. Muthukaruppan, MP, lay foundation stone, Palayamkottai, 4.30 p.m.

St. Xavier’s College: Department of English, conference on ‘Contours of postcolonial studies: Mapping across disciplines for plurality and humanism,’ inaugural function, Gauri Viswanathan, Columbia University, New York, USA, delivers keynote address, 9.15 a.m.; interface with Dr. Gauri, 11.50 a.m.; A.S. Dasan, Mysore University, speaks on ‘Postcolonial theory,’ 2 p.m.; paper presentation, 3.15 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous and Al-Anon: Meeting, V.K. Nursery and Primary School, Tirunelveli Town, 7 p.m.

MARTHANDAM

National Highways Authority of India: Ceremony to lay foundation stone for bridges in Marthandam and Parvathipuram and four-laning of NH 47 B, NH 47 and NH 381, Union Minister of State Pon Radhakrishnan participates, near Marthandam bus stand, 12.30 p.m.
title: engagements
